thread.title: BRIEF-Quotient Technology Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Quotient Technology Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Quotient Technology Inc:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $379 MILLION TO $394 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $83 MILLION TO $87 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 23 PERCENT TO $93.1 MILLION * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 * ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR Q1 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $11 MILLION TO $13 MILLION
* ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR FULL YEAR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $65 MILLION TO $73 MILLION.
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $92.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $89.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $385.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
